## setDefaultPreference() function

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on
> feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.

Sets a preference

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function setDefaultPreference(key: string, val: unknown): void
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                 | Description    |
| --------- | -------------------- | -------------- |
| key       | <code>string</code>  | The preference |
| val       | <code>unknown</code> | The value      |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
